item.title: 美联储主席洛根认为实现通胀目标仍需努力
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，她将非常谨慎地对待进一步降息，因为通胀风险仍然比失业率上升的威胁更为突出。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said she’ll approach additional rate cuts very cautiously while the risks to inflation remain more prominent than the threat of higher unemployment.】

item.title: 伯克希尔化学公司出售后，西方石油公司不再进行新的大宗交易
item.description: 西方石油公司向伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Occidental Petroleum Corp. is done with monster dealmaking after reaching its asset-sales target with the $9.7 billion chemical-unit sale to Berkshire Hathaway Inc.】

item.title: 英镑走强后埃及年内第四次降息
item.description: 埃及利用货币走强和通胀率达到 2022 年以来最低点的有利条件，进行了今年的第四次降息。【原文：Egypt made its fourth interest-rate cut of the year, taking advantage of a stronger currency and inflation that’s at its lowest since 2022.】

item.title: 美元疑虑正在企业债券市场显现
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 嘉能可（Glencore）、法国农业信贷银行准备出售加元债券
item.description: 两家欧洲公司正准备在加拿大债务市场发售债券，这将延续所谓枫叶债券销售的上升趋势。【原文：A pair of European firms are preparing to offer notes in Canada’s debt market, deals that would extend an uptrend of so-called maple bond sales.】

item.title: 非洲股市因改革反弹进入全球 20 强，美元下跌
item.description: 在关税战和地缘政治风险不断上升的背景下，非洲各地股市飙升，再次吸引了全球投资者追逐回报的目光。【原文：Stock markets across Africa are soaring, drawing renewed attention from global investors chasing returns amid a tariff war and rising geopolitical risks.】

item.title: 古根海姆的米尔斯坦称市场应警惕赤字问题
item.description: 古根海姆证券有限责任公司（Guggenheim Securities LLC）联席主席吉姆-米尔斯坦（Jim Millstein）认为，债券市场应该对美国的预算赤字感到焦虑，尤其是目前还没有计划对这一问题产生重大影响。【原文：The bond market should be anxious about the US budget deficit, especially since there are no plans in the works to make a significant dent in the problem, according to Guggenheim Securities LLC Co-Chair Jim Millstein.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织董事会将于 10 月 3 日讨论塞内加尔债务虚报案
item.description: 国际货币基金组织发言人表示，该组织执行董事会将于周五召开会议，讨论塞内加尔的债务虚报事件。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board will meet Friday to discuss Senegal’s debt misreporting case, a spokesperson said.】

item.title: 筹款时间比以往任何时候都长，私人信贷发挥创意
item.description: 传统现金来源枯竭的私人信贷基金正在开发新的途径，向保险和散户投资者拓展业务，这是其增长的下一个潜在动力。【原文：Private credit funds running down their traditional sources of cash are developing new ways to branch out to insurance and retail investors, the next potential drivers of their growth.】

item.title: 埃尼同意在莫桑比克建造价值 72 亿美元的液化天然气出口厂
item.description: 埃尼公司（Eni SpA）批准在莫桑比克建造一个价值 72 亿美元的浮式液化天然气项目，该项目将使莫桑比克的液化天然气产量翻一番，从而在本十年晚些时候新一轮生产浪潮到来之际增加全球供应。【原文：Eni SpA gave financial approval to build a $7.2 billion floating liquefied natural gas project in Mozambique that will double the nation’s production of the fuel, adding to global supply just as a wave of new production hits later this decade.】

item.title: 里克-佩里的费米公司利用伦敦上市呼吁全球供应商
item.description: 由美国前能源部长里克-佩里（Rick Perry）共同创办的房地产投资信托公司费米公司（Fermi Inc.【原文：For Fermi Inc., the real estate investment trust co-founded by former US Secretary of Energy Rick Perry, it was always part of the plan to list in both New York and London.】

item.title: FICO 将直接向抵押贷款经销商发放信用评分许可
item.description: Fair Isaac 公司现在将直接向抵押贷款经销商出售信用评分，此举将消除该行业对第三方信用局的依赖。【原文：Fair Isaac Corp. will now sell credit scores directly to mortgage resellers, a move that will remove the industry’s reliance on third-party credit bureaus.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国 "不会向阿根廷投钱"，并兜售掉期产品
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周四重申支持阿根廷的哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei），但警告说援助并不涉及美国的直接投资，这推动债券在过山车式的上午交易中涨跌互现。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent reiterated support for Argentina’s Javier Milei on Thursday, but warned that the aid doesn’t involve outright US investment, pushing bonds between gains and losses in a roller-coaster morning session.】

item.title: 阿尔戈马钢铁公司警告季度亏损后股价跌幅扩大
item.description: 阿尔戈马钢铁集团公司（Algoma Steel Group Inc.【原文：Algoma Steel Group Inc. extended this week’s share decline Thursday after the Canadian steelmaker said it expects to post an earnings loss in its third quarter amid shrinking steel shipments.】

item.title: 欧洲煤炭因核能和风能激增而跌至 19 个月低点
item.description: 由于风力和核能发电量激增，欧洲煤炭价格跌至 19 个月来的最低点，从而将这种较脏的燃料进一步挤出能源组合。【原文：European coal prices sank to a 19-month low as wind and nuclear generation soared, pushing the dirtier fuel further out of the energy mix.】

item.title: 停摆可能使数百万人的健康保险费用更高
item.description: 数百万自己购买医疗保险的美国人将在 2026 年面临更高的保费。至于高出多少，将取决于政府停摆之争中谁先眨眼。【原文：Millions of Americans who buy their own health insurance face higher premiums in 2026. Just how much higher will depend on who blinks first in the government-shutdown fight.】

item.title: 事故发生后，Winning 集团停止在几内亚西芒杜矿的运营
item.description: Winning Consortium Simandou 是开发几内亚西芒杜 1 号和 2 号铁矿石区块的矿业公司，在发生三名外国雇员死亡的事故后，该公司暂停了其 Kerouane 矿的运营。【原文：Winning Consortium Simandou, the mining company that’s developing Simandou iron ore Blocks 1 and 2 in Guinea, suspended operations at its Kerouane mine after an accident in which three foreign employees died.】

item.title: 科技股因人工智能狂热而大涨，交易员一扫停摆阴霾
item.description: OpenAI 股票出售后，这家人工智能公司的估值达到 5000 亿美元，在科技股的推动下，美国股市上扬。【原文：US stocks advanced, driven by tech shares, after an OpenAI share sale valued the artificial intelligence company at an $500 billion.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚将开设付费军事速成班以增强军队实力
item.description: 面对欧洲各国官员认为日益增长的俄罗斯安全威胁，罗马尼亚将为年轻人提供为期四个月的带薪军事训练，以振兴和扩充其军队。【原文：Romania will offer paid, four-month military training to young people to rejuvenate and expand its army in the face of what officials around Europe view as a growing Russian security threat.】

item.title: 阿布扎比皇家银行 IHC 收购印度影子银行 10 亿美元股份
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的上市公司已同意以约 10 亿美元的价格收购印度 Sammaan Capital Ltd. 公司的大量股份，这表明外国投资者对这个南亚国家的金融服务业持续保持兴趣。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s largest listed company has agreed to acquire a significant stake in India’s Sammaan Capital Ltd. for about $1 billion, signaling foreign investors’ continued interest in the South Asian nation’s financial services sector.】

item.title: Dye & Durham 公司前首席财务官向董事会施压，要求出售公司
item.description: Dye & Durham Ltd.的前首席财务官表示，他计划提名新的董事，并要求出售公司，从而使与董事会长达数月的争斗升级。【原文：Dye & Durham Ltd.’s former chief financial officer said he plans to nominate new directors and press for a sale of the company, escalating a monthslong fight with the board.】

item.title: 安大略省教师协会希望以 20 亿美元的估值退出 Logoplaste 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，安大略省教师退休金计划委员会正在探讨出售葡萄牙包装生产商 Logoplaste 公司，该公司的交易价值可能超过 17 亿欧元（20 亿美元）。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan Board is exploring a sale of Portuguese packaging maker Logoplaste, which could be valued at more than €1.7 billion ($2 billion) in a deal, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国可能放宽对苏格兰威士忌的关税以帮助波本威士忌行业
item.description: 在英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）上个月对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行国事访问时提出这一问题后，特朗普政府官员正在考虑放宽对苏格兰威士忌的关税。【原文：Trump administration officials are considering easing tariffs on Scotch whisky after Prime Minister Keir Starmer raised the issue with President Donald Trump at last month’s state visit.】

item.title: 中国协鑫将在埃塞俄比亚建造价值 25 亿美元的炼油厂
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚首个炼油厂破土动工，政府称该项目耗资 25 亿美元，由中国金豪集团有限公司（Golden Concord Group Ltd. ）承建，每年可生产 350 万吨燃料。【原文：Ethiopia broke ground on its first oil refinery, a $2.5-billion project that the government said is being built by Golden Concord Group Ltd. of China and with capacity to produce 3.5 million tons of fuel a year.】

item.title: 戈东瓦纳说，非洲必须减少对外部资金的依赖
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）表示，非洲面临着外国医疗援助 "令人不安的下降"，应该在国内筹集更多资金，包括通过征收烟酒税。【原文：Africa faces a “distressing decline” in foreign health aid and should raise more money domestically, including via taxes on tobacco and alcohol, said South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana.】

item.title: 尼日利亚在丹格特为期三天的罢工中损失了约 16% 的石油产量
item.description: 在为期三天的石油工人罢工之后，尼日利亚的原油和天然气生产遭受了重大损失，罢工威胁到切断对 Dangote 炼油厂的原油供应，直到罢工被取消。【原文：Nigeria suffered significant crude and gas production losses after a three-day oil workers’ strike that threatened to cut crude supplies to the Dangote refinery until it was called off.】

item.title: 据称科威特将与摩根大通达成高达 70 亿美元的管道交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，科威特石油公司正在聘请摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Kuwait Petroleum Corp. is hiring JPMorgan Chase & Co. to help lease part of its pipeline network, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 海运石油货物飙升，主要出口国增加运输量
item.description: 由于沙特阿拉伯、俄罗斯和美国这三个世界上最大的石油出口国都向全球市场输送了更多的石油，上个月的石油海运量猛增。【原文：The seaborne flow of oil soared last month as the world’s three largest exporters of cargoes — Saudi Arabia, Russia and the US — all poured far more barrels to the global market.】

item.title: 瑞安航空预计法国空管罢工每天将取消 600 个航班
item.description: 瑞安航空控股公司（Ryanair Holdings Plc）预计下周每天将取消 600 个航班，届时法国空中交通管制员将因薪酬和工作条件纠纷而离职。【原文：Ryanair Holdings Plc expects to cancel 600 flights a day next week when French air traffic controllers walk off the job in a dispute over pay and working conditions.】

item.title: 英国考虑提高支持可再生能源所需的天然气价格
item.description: 英国正在考虑为新的天然气发电厂提供更高的价格，以便在电力紧张时能够使用，从而刺激投资，尽管英国的目标是几乎消除电网中的化石燃料。【原文：The UK is considering offering new gas-fired power plants higher prices to be available in times of stress to spur investment, even as it aims to almost eliminate fossil fuels in the power grid.】
